gameOverview:
You have been left on a deserted island by your pirate comrads. Your task is to locate the hidden treasure and send a signal to them once you have it. You will not be rescued until you find it.

Why only you? Who knows what dangers lurk on this mysterious island. They selected you because you were the smartest, strongest and bravest of their crew. Thanks a lot!

screens.title: The beach
screens.description: You are standing on a white sandy beach. All around you are pieces of driftwood that have washed onto the sand during a recent storm. Out to sea you can see the sails of your ship where your crew are waiting for you signal.

screens.title: Green grove
screens.description: You have entered a little clearing of trees. You can tell that somebody has been here before. In the middle of the clearing is a statue that looks quite interesting.

screens.title: South beach
screens.description: Yet another beautiful sandy beach. The water looks cool and inviting.

actions.script:
game.error("You wade into the beautiful clear water and feel instantly refreshed. As several dorsal fins begin to circle around you it seems that having a quick dip while there was work to be done wasn't such a good idea. On the up side you have provided a meal to some hungry sharks. On the down side you are unable to complete the game with no arms legs or head.")
game.endGame()

screens.description: The trail has led you into a little valley.

screens.title: Bridge west
screens.description: You are on the western side of a river.

links.description: Somebody has made a bridge accross the river using planks of wood and rope. That was some time ago though and it looks a little bit dangerous.
links.cant_pass_message: You've taken some risks in your time but walking over that rickety bridge would be bridge too far! The timbers are rotten and the ropes are frayed.

screens.title: Southern tip
screens.description: This is the south tip of the island. A little way out to see are some jagged rocks on which there rests a shipwreck. Although it will never sail again the ship looks to be in relatively good condition.

actions.script:
game.goTo("Shipwreck")
game.error("You dive in the water and swim your heart out")
